publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1157 Scott Barrie: Congratulations to Torryburn Primary School-That the Parliament notes the excellent follow-up report by HM Inspectorate of Education on Torryburn Primary School, published on 21 March 2004; acknowledges the hard work of the staff, pupils, parents and school board since the first inspection in spring 2002; notes the involvement of both Newmills and Torryburn Community Council and High Valleyfield Community Council in this process; pays particular tribute to the work of the new head teacher who took up post at the beginning of this academic year, and congratulates all concerned and wishes the current staff and pupils every success for the future.
S2M-1157 Congratulations to Torryburn Primary School (lodged on 8 April 2004) Pauline McNeill*, Elaine Smith*, Jackie Baillie*
S2M-1157 Congratulations to Torryburn Primary School (lodged on 8 April 2004) John Swinburne*
S2M-1157 Congratulations to Torryburn Primary School (lodged on 8 April 2004) Tricia Marwick*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Christine May*, Mike Watson*, Bruce Crawford*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-1157 Congratulations to Torryburn Primary School (lodged on 8 April 2004) Helen Eadie*
